features: Pretend to Drive: Unleash your child's imagination with this toy steering wheel for kids; learn to drive safely from the car seat and turn the wheel to move the cute puppy character
Educational: Kids steering wheel toy introduces your child to different animals, colors, vehicles and numbers through fun & engaging car-themed features
Interactive: While most 6 month old baby toys contain static car parts, this play steering wheel features 5 colorful buttons including a signal and gear shift
Musical: Play steering wheel for children includes 3 modes for your little driver: driving, music, & animal mode; 60+ songs, melodies, sounds and phrases
Makes a Great Gift: Perfect for ages 6 months to 3 years; toy steering wheel for car seat, stroller, or at home play; 2 AA batteries included for demo purposes only
body.description: Drive into learning fun with the Turn & Learn Driver by VTech. Comes complete with a traffic light, a signal lever that plays fun sounds and a gear shift that pushes and pulls to introduce opposites. This kid’s steering wheel also features three play modes so your little driver can learn in animal, driving and music mode. Your little one will love pretending to drive right from their stroller or car seat. They can move the cute dog character back and forth by practicing turns and shifting gears. They can also practice signals and eye contact through the mirror on the side of the wheel. The Turn & Learn Driver by VTech helps introduce your child to different animals and vehicles with five colorful buttons. Perfect for babies & toddlers, this toy introduces colors, numbers, and more through a variety of interactive car-themed features. The fun, sleek design also encourages and strengthens imaginative play. Requires 2 AA batteries (batteries included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use). Intended for ages 6 months to 3 years.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Teaches: Daily life Colors Fine motor skills Pretend play Beep, beep! Pretend to drive using the steering wheel, causing the cute dog character to move back and forth. Press the five colorful buttons to play 60+ songs and phrases about different animals and vehicles. Encourage imaginative play with a signal lever that triggers fun sounds and music, a traffic light and a gear shifter that pushes and pulls to introduce opposites. Buckle up and play!

Features 3 Ways to Play Use the mode selector to explore animal mode, driving mode and music mode. Imaginative Play Turn the steering wheel, shift gears and use the signal lever like a real car. Play and Learn Press the five interactive buttons to learn different animals and vehicles with songs and phrases. Rules of the Road Honk the horn and introduce road safety with red, yellow and green lights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Baby Toy
reviews.reviewText: This is a great toy to teach kids some motor skills. It has different sounds and songs so that babies tend to gravitate toward it and want to play with it. It also has a lot of settings so the toy can be used for a long time and the kid won't get bored with it. For anyone who has a child who wants to drive with the adults, this is small enough to take in the car and the child can use it while sitting in their car seat.

reviews.reviewerName: Easy to use, bright shimmery colors that add a pop to your alcohol ink masterpiece. I have asl used it to create a beautiful effect with acrylic paint.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Driving fun center
reviews.reviewText: This toddler friendly driving toy is just what the little racer wanted (and his Daddy), promotes hours of fun, exploring the different actions. Well made, sturdy, bright colors, easy clean up toy, will get your little racer ready for the track. Moderate price point, but worth it, especially for a Junior car enthusiast.

reviews.reviewText: The kids loved it so much I had to buy a couple of them, very sturdy, has sounds, music, lights etc.Great for hours of playing.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and interactive toy
reviews.reviewText: My grandson just turned one and he enjoys this because it is light weight and he can easily pick it up and play with it. Knobs are easy for him to maneuver and he doesn't have to touch too hard to get it to make sounds. This is a great product, interactable, and giftable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love all the functions on the toy!!
reviews.reviewText: The VTech Turn and Learn Driver is an engaging and interactive toy that provides a fun driving experience for young children. With its vibrant colors, realistic features, and educational elements, this toy encourages imaginative play and helps develop essential skills. Here's my review of the VTech Turn and Learn Driver.The standout feature of this toy is its realistic design and interactive features. The steering wheel mimics a real car's steering wheel, complete with buttons, a gear shifter, and a turning key. The colorful buttons play a variety of sounds, melodies, and phrases, engaging children's senses and stimulating their curiosity. The gear shifter and turning key provide tactile feedback, enhancing the overall play experience. The Turn and Learn Driver requires two AA batteries, which are not included. It is advisable to have extra batteries on hand to ensure uninterrupted playtime. In conclusion, the VTech Turn and Learn Driver provides a fun and interactive driving experience for young children. Its realistic design, interactive features, and educational content make it an engaging and beneficial toy for imaginative play and skill development. While the need for batteries and the volume control are factors to consider, the overall performance and value of the VTech Turn and Learn Driver make it a reliable choice for young drivers in the making.
